Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Two contiguous suites - 833 SF and 2,000 SF

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Free on-site covered and secured parking (2.54/1,000 SF)
On-site dining, child care, fitness, banking and shuttle service to CBD and Union Station

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located near the merge of Interstate 95 and Interstate 91 in New Haven, Connecticut with highway visibility.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Class A office building with spectacular water views overlooking the New Haven Harbor.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Over 100,000 SF of Office Space Available

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE is pleased to present the excellent opportunity to lease superbly fit out space in the high rise portion of one of New Haven’s signature class A office facilities. The space offers high end finishes and varied existing conditions for great versatility.

• 360 degree views of New Haven

• Lots of natural light

• Ample structured parking

• Fitness area with lockers & showers

• Walking distance to courthouses, Yale, YNHH and area amenities

• Internal stairwell

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Up to 49,029 SF on Three Floors Available for Lease
Up to 60,000 SF of Office Space Available
